TopicTitle: DEMV MK.5, how to transfer energy?

Articles.Content:
It says you can transfer energy wirelessly up to 1000m. I tried that with various stuff and it seems it dont work. Tried proximity transfer without targeting, with targeting.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-demv-mk-5-ant/

Anyone can help? I have a stuck rover that i want to recharge and bring back to base.
you can transfer energy from a DEMV 2 to a DEMV 5, thays all I know
